pages.text: Load it up with cages and it will catch any bee flying over it. You can put a flower or $(l:blocks/feeder)feeding slab$(/l) on top to attract bees.

The Catcher accepts three upgrades; A $(l:items/upgrades#babee)BaBee upgrade$(/l) will filter out adult bees and only catch BaBees. $(l:items/upgrades#filter)Filter upgrade$(/l) will make catch only the bees on the filter. A $(l:items/upgrades#range)Range upgrade$(/l) will increase the range. Multiple Range upgrades can be installed.
